name: Driver!
description:
Addictive car racing game with cool animations and effects!

The gameplay is smooth and the music and sound effects are incredible.
No need to learn a difficult pattern, just see how far you can race! Dodge all cars and obstacles and collect as many points as you can.
You are the DRIVER! Show your best skills.

Sounds crazy, well, it is! This game will surely take you to new heights! Take the challenge now and play with your true-blooded racing friends through this game's feature.


'Shocking Game! There's Nothing Like This On The App Store!'
'Download Now And Discover Why This Game Is The Top Download!'
'Millions Of Fans All Over The World And I'm One Of Them!'
'The Ultimate Racing Game Today! Unbelievable Excitement!'


*** ADDICTIVE GAME FEATURES ***
- Control the two racing cars to the end!
- Super awesome graphics and motion
- Addicting and proven me concept
- Unlimited attempts to break your record
- Great sound effects and music
- Turn on/off music and sound effects
- Available on iPhone and iPad
